1.<center>王家の財宝を荒らす者は 誰だ……。|我が眠りを妨げる者は 誰だ…: Who dares to ransack the royal treasury? Who|dares to disturb my sleep?

2.<center>また現れたのか……いやしい賊め……。|これ以上 王家の財宝を荒ら: There you are again... A vicious bandit... I|will not have you ransack the royal treasury|and disturb my sleep.

3.<center>秘宝の守護者を おそれず|何度も やってきおって……。|貴様……: You have come again and again, unafraid of|the guardian of the hidden treasure. You...|Who are you?

4.<center>貴様の勇気に免じ 我が名を教えてやろう……。|我は この大ピラミ:
Because of your courage, I will tell you my|name... I am the builder of the Great|Pyramid, the Pharaoh of Pharaohs... Arach|
|Kha...

5.<center>我のなきがらは 神秘のチカラを宿す|秘宝と共に このピラミッドに:
My ashes were placed in this pyramid along|with the treasure that holds the mystical|power... All to protect the golden|
|treasure...

6.<center>予想どおり……我の死後 黄金の秘宝を|狙う者が あとを絶たなかっ:
As expected... Since my death, there has been|no end to the number of those who have sought|the golden treasure. A nuisance who claimed|
|to be a seeker of treasure.

7.<center>神聖なる黄金の秘宝が けがされぬよう|我は この地に眠る死者を:
To ensure that the sacred golden treasure|remains unharmed, I have raised the dead who|lie dormant in this land As guardian of our|
|treasure...

8.<center>秘宝の守護者の中には かつて|ファラオと呼ばれた 時の王たちもい: Among the guardians of the treasure are the|kings of time, once called pharaohs. The|Golden Fleece is the pride of my people.

9.<center>なぜだ……。|なぜ しつように 黄金の秘宝を狙う……？|何が貴様: Why... Why do you persist in seeking the|golden treasure? What is it that drives you|to the treasure?

10.<center>幾度となく この地を訪れる 貴様は……|まさか 伝説の秘宝の探求: You have visited this place many times. You|are not the seeker of the legendary treasure.|Syndra? Why are you here?

11.<center>伝説の秘宝の探求者 シンドラ……。|まさか 死んだはずの貴様と: Syndra, seeker of the legendary treasure... I|never thought I'd see the day when I'd see|you again...

12.<center>シンドラ……。思い返せば 貴様と我の勝負は|いまだ 決していなか: Syndra... As I recall, you and I have never|met before. Perhaps it is fate that brings us|together.

13.<center>おかしい……。貴様とは 何度も戦ったが|なぜ 愛用していた あの:
Strange... I've fought you many times, but|why don't you use your beloved curved sword|of the Sun God? Do you underestimate me?|
|You...

14.<center>伝説の秘宝の探求者 シンドラの証たる|太陽神の曲刀を どうあって:
How dare you not wield the curved blade of|the sun god, the token of the legendary|treasure seeker, Syndra? You're not... You're|
|not Syndra?

15.<center>そうか……。貴様 シンドラではなかったのだな。|あやつのような: Well... You are no Syndra. I never thought|I'd see a treasure seeker with a bone like|him again.

16.<center>どうしたことだ……。胸が おどる……。|貴様の足音が この地に:
What's going on? My heart is pounding...|Every time I hear your footsteps approach|this place... What have you done, you... What|
|have you done to me?

17.<center>きょ……今日は 少し遅かったな……。|このアラハ・カーメンを じ:
Hey... You're a little late today... You're a|little late today... to be messing with this|Arachne Kamen. You have more courage than|
|Cyndra...

18.<center>遅い……！ 遅いぞ 貴様ああぁぁぁ……！|さては 貴様……我の心:
Too late...! You're late, you idiot...! So,|you... You're playing with my mind. You're|enjoying it. No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no,|
|no...

19.<center>我は 死にながらにして 生きがいを|見つけてしまった……。それは: I've found my purpose in life, even in death.|It is... To fight you for the golden|treasure.

20.<center>よく来たな 奇跡の探求者よ！|さあ 今日も 我の血潮をたぎらせて: Welcome, miracle seeker! Let my blood flow|again today! Come, guardian of the treasure!

22.<center>秘宝の守護者よ。|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えよ……！: Guardians of the Treasure. Give death to|those who would harm the royal family.

39.<center>ゆけっ 秘宝の守護者よ！|王家に仇なす者に 死を与えるのだ！: Come, guardians of the hoard! Give death to|those who would avenge the royal family!

40.<center>死せる者に 生きがいを与えるとは|貴様は まさに 奇跡の探求者よ: To give the dead something to live for, you|are truly a miracle seeker.

41.<center>ゆけっ 秘宝の守護者よ！|今日こそ この者に 泣きを見せるのだ！: Come, guardians of the hoard! Today is the|day you must show him your tears!
